name: BPM: Best Project Manager
description:
A graduation project inspired by the popular tv series: The Apprentice. You were summoned to Max'm Industries to lead a team of 6 candidates hoping to be hired. Will you lead them to victory or will someone be fired?

This game was designed to help train and improve the leadership skills of project managers in the workplace. Even if you're not a project manager in real life, you might still learn leadership skills that prove useful to you in the future.

This is my very 1st game. Thanks for giving it a chance.
